item.title: Stifel Hikes Price Target On Tesla After FSD V14 Roll Out, Reiterates Hopes In Robotaxi
item.description: The analyst’s new price target represents a potential upside of about 12% from the stock’s closing price on Tuesday.

item.title: Gold Price Surges To New Highs Ahead Of Fed Minutes, Analyst Reportedly Says $4,400 Possible By First Half Of 2026
item.description: Spot gold prices climbed to a new high of $4,049 per troy ounce, while gold futures maturing in December gained 1.7% to rise to $4,071.
